solution_line_template: Lara gave {flowers_to_mom} + {more_flowers_to_grandma} = <<{flowers_to_mom}+{more_flowers_to_grandma}={flowers_to_grandma}>>{flowers_to_grandma} stems of flowers to her grandma.
She gave away {flowers_to_grandma} + {flowers_to_mom} = <<{flowers_to_grandma}+{flowers_to_mom}={total_given_away}>>{total_given_away} stems of flowers.
Therefore, Lara put {total_stems_bought} - {total_given_away} = <<{total_stems_bought}-{total_given_away}={flowers_in_vase}>>{flowers_in_vase} stems of flowers in the vase.
